content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, the iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which cannot be crafted without sufficient iron-plate in your inventory or a functioning furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
